text: visvasiccavare, ninnal allahuvinre margattil yud'dhattiniranniyal satrukkaleyum mitrannaleyum vertiriccariyanam. arenkilum ninnalkk salam cealliyal aihikanettamagrahicc “ni visvasiyalle”nn ayaleatu parayarut. allahuvinkal samararjita sampatt dharalamunt. neratte ninnalum avarippealulla ate avastha yilayirunnallea. pinne allahu ninnaleat audaryam kaniccu. atinal karyannal vyaktamayi manas'silakkuka. allahu ninnal ceyyunnatellam suksmamayi ariyunnavanan
